What were the main reasons to switch the PieschenBank WebApp from AmazonWebServices (especially EcZwo) to AppEngine?
 * Free AppQuota, with the potential of a better growing DeveloperCommunity 
 * a much better scalable DataStore
 * great AdminConsole
 * runs out of the box HtTps
 * easier DePloy'ment
 * ChannelApi for LiveChat and BrowserGame's
